name: Lighted Knights
description:
Raised by a sage with a dark and secret past, Kress must forge friendships to defeat a fierce opponent who desires control of the Free Kingdoms.

Lighted Knights is a fantastic role-playing game with an addictive and satisfying turn-based combat system set amidst a 3D animated world.

You will battle through relentless enemies, whilst you watch your characters grow and mature. Explore the diverse world of Vesaile, solve puzzles, and discover the secrets of the Lighted Knights.

Key Features

  • Gorgeous 3D RPG graphics and hand painted 2D art.
  • Addictive turn-based combat system.
  • Over 50 different enemies to slaughter, from thieves and mages to deadly spiders and winged demons.
  • Original orchestral soundtrack composed by renowned artist Chaku Paku. Check out his music which is available on iTunes/Google Play.
  • Hours of pure JRPG fun.
